content.html: It’s #WorldMentalHealthDay! Please take care of your mental health. This year I had a breakdown on the hottest day on record and it was one of the worst days of my life. Talking about it with friends and family really helped, as did going for walks & petting dogs.
content.value: It’s #WorldMentalHealthDay! Please take care of your mental health. This year I had a breakdown on the hottest day on record and it was one of the worst days of my life. Talking about it with friends and family really helped, as did going for walks & petting dogs.
